
op(4)   rd(6)    rs(6)   rt(6)    unused(10)

0000    000000   000000  000000   00000 00000

//--



//LDPC r1, 0x100:
block[10] = 32'b1111 000001 000000 000000 01 0000 0000;

//HAZARD POTENTIAL

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;

block[] = 32'b0101 000010 000001 000000 00 0000 0000; //INC r2, r1

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;


block[] = 32'b0110 000011 000001 000000 00 0000 0000; //NEG r3, r1

//?? should label 1 be in bytes? lines? wut. Currently 5: 4 NOOPS + 1 INC

block[] = 32'b1111 001010 000000 000000 00 0000 1000; //LDPC r10, 8

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;

block[] = 32'b0101 000010 000010 000000 00 0000 0000; //INC r2, r2: (NOT EXECUTED)

//label1:
block[] = 32'b0011 000000 000001 000001 00 0000 0000; //ST r1, r1

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
//potentially kill this last one ^

block[] = 32'b1110 000100 000001 000000 00 0000 0000; //LD r4, r1

block[] = 32'b0100 000101 000001 000010 00 0000 0000; //ADD r5, r1, r2

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;

block[] = 32'b0111 000110 000100 000001 00 0000 0000; //SUB r6, r4, r1

block[] = 32'b1111 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0101; //LDPC r11, 9 (NOT SURE IF I TRUST THIS 9, is JUST LIKE 8 FROM ABOVE)

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;



block[] = 32'b1001 000000 001011 000000 00 0000 0000; //BRZ r11: (THE ZERO FLAG NEEDS TO BE SET MY NIGGA)

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;

block[] = 32'b0101 000010 000010 000000 00 0000 0000; //INC r2, r2: (NOT EXECUTED)

//label2:

block[] = 32'b1010 000000 000001 000000 00 0000 0000; //JM r1

block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
block[] = 32'b0000 000000 000000 000000 00 0000 0000;
